message.subject: Admin Asst's Day
message.content:
M1.1. We need to get something for Ina for Admin Asst's Day - it is tomorrow.
[Inform: recipients need to get something for Ina for Administrative Assistants' Day]
M1.2. I
will take a collection of $10 from each person and get a gift certificate
from Foley's if that is okay with everyone.
[Inform: Tori will collect $10 from everyone and get a gift certificate from Foley's if everyone agrees to it]
M1.3. I will probably have to go get
the gift certificate tonight - so please dont stick me with more than my
share of the bill.
[Inform: Tori will probably have to get gift certificate tonight, so would not like to have to pay more than everyone else]
M1.4. ( Thats what happened last time)
[Inform: last time, Tori ended up paying more than her share]
M1.5. Thanks.
[Conventional: thanks]
